ValidationRule.description: If User Story is using Quality Gates from Quality Clouds, the Quality Gates results should be PASSED or be APROVED by Peer Review2
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( AND( PRIORVALUE(copado__Promote_Change__c) = false, copado__Promote_Change__c = true ), AND( PRIORVALUE(copado__Promote_and_Deploy__c) = false, copado__Promote_and_Deploy__c = true )), NOT(ISBLANK(copado__Latest_Commit_Date__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Peer_Review__c, 'Peer Review Approved')), ISPICKVAL(Quality_Gates_Result__c, "NOT PASSED") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This User Story does not meet the required QC Quality Gates threshold to be promoted.
